jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-3405591355 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Lower than Industry Revenue Growth</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">A higher-than-industry revenue growth represents increased potential for the company to increase yearly rate of 1.01%, vs industry avg of 6.71%</p></div></div><div tag="normal" eventlabel="Clicked Financial Statement" class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 commentary-item-root content relative tooltip-holder"><h4 class="jsx-3550457685 jsx-1174656852 jsx-3058509668 typography-body-medium-m text-primary d-inline-block no-select  pointer ">Decreasing Market Share</h4><div class="jsx-358067648 tooltip-root    sh-tooltip font-regular">Market share is the percentage of an industry&#x27;s total sales going to a particular company. Vistra Corporate Services has been appointed as Security Trustee by SafeGold.
